name: NanoGeomatics EmergencyLib.NET
short_description: The NanoGeomatics EmergencyLib.NET is an opensource software project aiming to develop a library for the support of emergency management. The library is going to implement a series of emerging standards such as CAP, EDXL etc using .NET Framework.
